episode_event_swsh_2021_solo/6901_1001_0:
I hope we were able to show everyone just how
great Galar an’ Spikemuth are.

I’m sure the other sync pairs got excited after
seeing us show off our strength.

They’ll be training even more to come after us! I
imagine we’ll be getting some calls for rematches
in the near future!

It’s so exciting! My wish is for Trainers to work
together to become as strong as they can be!

That must be why the Champion’s battles can get
everyone so heated up!
It’s the same for you, Sis.
You keep giving it your all for our hometown.
episode_event_swsh_2021_solo/6901_1001_1:
That’s why everyone cheers for you
so passionately.

I also wanna give ’em all the results they’re
cheering for!

I’ll keep working on getting stronger together
with everyone.

If we all work together, I know we can make our
dreams come true!
